<static> cross(a, b) → {Point|number}

Perform the cross product on either two points (this produces a scalar) or a point and a scalar (this produces a point). This function requires two parameters, either may be a Point object or a number.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
a XY | number Point object or scalar.
b XY | number Point object or scalar.

Returns:

toJSON()

JSON output, only coordinates
Source:
  • point.js, line 77
Example

toString() → {string}

For pretty printing
Source:
  • point.js, line 67
Returns:
"(x;y)"
Type
string
Example
"p=" + new poly2tri.Point(5,42)
// → "p=(5;42)"
